CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Aesthetic Medical International Holdings Group Ltd.

Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 1122, NANSHAN BOULEVARD NANSHAN DISTRICT, GUANGDONG PROVINCE, SHENZHEN, 518052, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aesthetic Medical International Holdings Group Ltd provides aesthetic medical services in China. The company generates revenue from four service offerings: non-surgical aesthetic medical services, surgical aesthetic medical services, other aesthetic medical services and general healthcare services in the People's Republic of China. Most of the firm's revenue gets derived from Non-surgical aesthetic medical services. Geographically, it derives revenue from China.
